title: The ordered field of real numbers

blocks.name: crefld
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the field of real numbers.
blocks.origin: const class crefld { RRfld }

blocks.name: diff.crefld.s
diff.crefld.c
diff.crefld.w
df-refld
blocks.content: The field of real numbers. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: rebase
blocks.content: The base of the field of reals. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: remulg
blocks.content: The multiplication (group power) operation of the group of reals. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm remulg(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cr)), wceq(co(c0, cfv(cmg, crefld), c1), co(c0, cmul, c1)))
} = {
  eqtr3d(co(c0, cfv(cmg, crefld), c1), co(c0, cmul, c1), co(c0, cfv(cmg, ccnfld), c1), wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cr)))
  mp3an1(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(co(c0, cfv(cmg, ccnfld), c1), co(c0, cfv(cmg, crefld), c1)), wcel(cr, cfv(csubg, ccnfld)))
  cnsubglem(hs0, hs1, cr, nat1)
  recn(cv(hs0))
  readdcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  renegcl(cv(hs0))
  1re()
  subgmulg(cr, ccnfld, c0, c1, cfv(cmg, ccnfld), cfv(cmg, crefld), crefld)
  eqid(cfv(cmg, ccnfld))
  df-refld()
  eqid(cfv(cmg, crefld))
  syldan(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cr), wceq(co(c0, cfv(cmg, ccnfld), c1), co(c0, cmul, c1)), wcel(c1, cc))
  recnd(c1, wa(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cr)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, cz), wcel(c1, cr))
  cnfldmulg(c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm remulg(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)‚Üí(c0[(.g ` RRfld)]c1)=(c0[√ó]c1))
} = {
  eqtr3d((c0[(.g ` RRfld)]c1), (c0[√ó]c1), (c0[(.g ` CCfld)]c1), (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù))
  mp3an1(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, (c0[(.g ` CCfld)]c1)=(c0[(.g ` RRfld)]c1), ‚Ñù ‚àà(SubGrp ` CCfld))
  cnsubglem(hs0, hs1, cr, nat1)
  recn(hs0)
  readdcl(hs0, hs1)
  renegcl(hs0)
  1re()
  subgmulg(cr, ccnfld, c0, c1, (.g ` CCfld), (.g ` RRfld), crefld)
  eqid((.g ` CCfld))
  df-refld()
  eqid((.g ` RRfld))
  syldan(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, (c0[(.g ` CCfld)]c1)=(c0[√ó]c1), c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  recnd(c1, (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù))
  simpr(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  cnfldmulg(c0, c1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
}

blocks.name: resubdrg
blocks.content: The real numbers form a division subring of the complex numbers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Dec-2014.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm resubdrg() {
  |- wa(wcel(cr, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(crefld, cdr))
} = {
  mpbir(wa(wcel(cr, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(crefld, cdr)), wa(wcel(cr, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, cr), cdr)))
  cnsubdrglem(hs0, hs1, cr)
  recn(cv(hs0))
  readdcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  renegcl(cv(hs0))
  1re()
  remulcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  rereccl(cv(hs0))
  anbi2i(wcel(cr, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(crefld, cdr), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, cr), cdr))
  eleq1i(crefld, cdr, co(ccnfld, cress, cr))
  df-refld()
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm resubdrg() {
  ‚ä¢ (‚Ñù ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld)‚àß RRfld ‚àà DivRing)
} = {
  mpbir((‚Ñù ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld)‚àß RRfld ‚àà DivRing), (‚Ñù ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld)‚àß(CCfld[|`s]‚Ñù)‚àà DivRing))
  cnsubdrglem(hs0, hs1, cr)
  recn(hs0)
  readdcl(hs0, hs1)
  renegcl(hs0)
  1re()
  remulcl(hs0, hs1)
  rereccl(hs0)
  anbi2i(‚Ñù ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld), RRfld ‚àà DivRing, (CCfld[|`s]‚Ñù)‚àà DivRing)
  eleq1i(crefld, cdr, (CCfld[|`s]‚Ñù))
  df-refld()
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
}

blocks.name: resubgval
blocks.content: Subtraction in the field of real numbers. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: replusg
blocks.content: The addition operation of the field of reals. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jan-2018.)

blocks.name: remulr
blocks.content: The multiplication operation of the field of reals. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: re0g
blocks.content: The neutral element of the field of reals. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm re0g() {
  |- wceq(nat0, cfv(c0g, crefld))
} = {
  mp3an(wceq(nat0, cfv(c0g, crefld)), wcel(ccnfld, cmnd), wcel(nat0, cr), wss(cr, cc))
  mp2b(wcel(ccnfld, cmnd), wcel(ccnfld, ccrg), wcel(ccnfld, crg))
  cncrng()
  crngring(ccnfld)
  ringmnd(ccnfld)
  0re()
  ax-resscn()
  ress0g(ccnfld, nat0, cr, cc, crefld)
  df-refld()
  cnfldbas()
  cnfld0()
}
blocks.pretty:
thm re0g() {
  ‚ä¢ 0 =(0 ` RRfld)
} = {
  mp3an(0 =(0 ` RRfld), CCfld ‚àà Mnd, 0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚Ñù ‚äÜ ‚ÑÇ)
  mp2b(CCfld ‚àà Mnd, CCfld ‚àà CRing, CCfld ‚àà Ring)
  cncrng()
  crngring(ccnfld)
  ringmnd(ccnfld)
  0re()
  ax-resscn()
  ress0g(ccnfld, nat0, cr, cc, crefld)
  df-refld()
  cnfldbas()
  cnfld0()
}

blocks.name: re1r
blocks.content: The multiplicative neutral element of the field of reals. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Nov-2017.)

blocks.name: rele2
blocks.content: The ordering relation of the field of reals. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jan-2018.)

blocks.name: relt
blocks.content: The ordering relation of the field of reals. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jan-2018.)

blocks.name: reds
blocks.content: The distance of the field of reals. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 20-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: redvr
blocks.content: The division operation of the field of reals. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm redvr(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)), wceq(co(c0, cfv(cdvr, crefld), c1), co(c0, cdiv, c1)))
} = {
  eqcomd(co(c0, cfv(cdvr, crefld), c1), co(c0, cdiv, c1), w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)))
  mp3an2i(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)), wceq(co(c0, cdiv, c1), co(c0, cfv(cdvr, crefld), c1)), wcel(cr, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cfv(cui, crefld)))
  simpli(wcel(cr, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(crefld, cdr))
  simp1(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0))
  sylibr(w3a(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)), wcel(c1, cfv(cui, crefld)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0)))
  3simpc(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(c1, cfv(cui, crefld)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wne(c1, nat0))), wcel(crefld, cdr))
  simpri(wcel(crefld, cdr), wcel(cr, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  resubdrg()
  drngunit(crefld, c1, cfv(cui, crefld), cr, nat0)
  rebase()
  re0g()
  subrgdv(cr, ccnfld, c0, c1, cfv(cui, crefld), cdiv, cfv(cdvr, crefld), crefld)
  df-refld()
  cnflddiv()
  eqid(cfv(cui, crefld))
  eqid(cfv(cdvr, crefld))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm redvr(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚â† 0)‚Üí(c0[(/r ` RRfld)]c1)=(c0[√∑]c1))
} = {
  eqcomd((c0[(/r ` RRfld)]c1), (c0[√∑]c1), (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚â† 0))
  mp3an2i((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚â† 0), (c0[√∑]c1)=(c0[(/r ` RRfld)]c1), ‚Ñù ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld), c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c1 ‚àà(Unit ` RRfld))
  simpli(‚Ñù ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld), RRfld ‚àà DivRing)
  simp1(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c1 ‚â† 0)
  sylibr((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚â† 0), c1 ‚àà(Unit ` RRfld), (c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚â† 0))
  3simpc(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù, c1 ‚â† 0)
  ax-mp((c1 ‚àà(Unit ` RRfld)‚Üî(c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚â† 0)), RRfld ‚àà DivRing)
  simpri(RRfld ‚àà DivRing, ‚Ñù ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))
  resubdrg()
  drngunit(crefld, c1, (Unit ` RRfld), cr, nat0)
  rebase()
  re0g()
  subrgdv(cr, ccnfld, c0, c1, (Unit ` RRfld), cdiv, (/r ` RRfld), crefld)
  df-refld()
  cnflddiv()
  eqid((Unit ` RRfld))
  eqid((/r ` RRfld))
}

blocks.name: retos
blocks.content: The real numbers are a totally ordered set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 21-Jan-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm retos() {
  |- wcel(crefld, ctos)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wcel(crefld, ctos), wor(clt, cr), wss(cres(cid, cr), cle))
  ltso()
  mprgbir(hs0, cr, wss(cres(cid, cr), cle), wbr(cv(hs0), cle, cv(hs0)))
  idref(hs0, cr, cle)
  leid(cv(hs0))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(crefld, ctos), wa(wor(clt, cr), wss(cres(cid, cr), cle))), wcel(crefld, universe))
  ovexi(crefld, ccnfld, cress, cr)
  df-refld()
  tosso(crefld, universe, clt, cr, cle)
  rebase()
  rele2()
  relt()
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(cle)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm retos() {
  ‚ä¢ RRfld ‚àà Toset
} = {
  mpbir2an(RRfld ‚àà Toset, < ‚â∫ ‚Ñù, (= |` ‚Ñù)‚äÜ ‚â§)
  ltso()
  mprgbir(hs0, cr, (= |` ‚Ñù)‚äÜ ‚â§, hs0[‚â§]hs0)
  idref(hs0, cr, cle)
  leid(hs0)
  ax-mp((RRfld ‚àà Toset ‚Üî(< ‚â∫ ‚Ñù ‚àß(= |` ‚Ñù)‚äÜ ‚â§)), RRfld ‚àà ùïå)
  ovexi(crefld, ccnfld, cress, cr)
  df-refld()
  tosso(crefld, universe, clt, cr, cle)
  rebase()
  rele2()
  relt()
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(cle)
}

blocks.name: refld
blocks.content: The real numbers form a field. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Nov-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm refld() {
  |- wcel(crefld, cfield)
} = {
  mpbir2an(wcel(crefld, cfield), wcel(crefld, cdr), wcel(crefld, ccrg))
  simpri(wcel(crefld, cdr), wcel(cr, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  eqeltri(crefld, ccrg, co(ccnfld, cress, cr))
  df-refld()
  mp2an(wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, cr), ccrg), wcel(ccnfld, ccrg), wcel(cr, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  cncrng()
  simpli(wcel(cr, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(crefld, cdr))
  resubdrg()
  subrgcrng(ccnfld, cr, co(ccnfld, cress, cr))
  eqid(co(ccnfld, cress, cr))
  isfld(crefld)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm refld() {
  ‚ä¢ RRfld ‚àà Field
} = {
  mpbir2an(RRfld ‚àà Field, RRfld ‚àà DivRing, RRfld ‚àà CRing)
  simpri(RRfld ‚àà DivRing, ‚Ñù ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))
  eqeltri(crefld, ccrg, (CCfld[|`s]‚Ñù))
  df-refld()
  mp2an((CCfld[|`s]‚Ñù)‚àà CRing, CCfld ‚àà CRing, ‚Ñù ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))
  cncrng()
  simpli(‚Ñù ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld), RRfld ‚àà DivRing)
  resubdrg()
  subrgcrng(ccnfld, cr, (CCfld[|`s]‚Ñù))
  eqid((CCfld[|`s]‚Ñù))
  isfld(crefld)
}

blocks.name: refldcj
blocks.content: The conjugation operation of the field of real numbers. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jun-2019.)

blocks.name: recrng
blocks.content: The real numbers form a star ring. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Apr-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm recrng() {
  |- wcel(crefld, csr)
} = {
  mptru(wcel(crefld, csr))
  idsrngd(hs0, crefld, cr, ccj, wtru)
  rebase()
  refldcj()
  a1i(wtru, wcel(crefld, ccrg))
  simpri(wcel(crefld, ccrg), wcel(crefld, cdr))
  mpbi(wa(wcel(crefld, cdr), wcel(crefld, ccrg)), wcel(crefld, cfield))
  refld()
  isfld(crefld)
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wceq(cfv(ccj, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))
  cjre(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(crefld)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(ccj)
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm recrng() {
  ‚ä¢ RRfld ‚àà *Ring
} = {
  mptru(RRfld ‚àà *Ring)
  idsrngd(hs0, crefld, cr, ccj, wtru)
  rebase()
  refldcj()
  a1i(wtru, RRfld ‚àà CRing)
  simpri(RRfld ‚àà CRing, RRfld ‚àà DivRing)
  mpbi((RRfld ‚àà DivRing ‚àß RRfld ‚àà CRing), RRfld ‚àà Field)
  refld()
  isfld(crefld)
  adantl(wtru, hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, (* ` hs0)= hs0)
  cjre(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(crefld)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(ccj)
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
}

blocks.name: regsumsupp
blocks.content: The group sum over the real numbers, expressed as a finite sum. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 22-Jun-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 19-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm regsumsupp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(crefld, cgsu, c0), csu(s0, co(c0, csupp, nat0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  3eqtrd(co(crefld, cgsu, c0), csu(s0, co(c0, csupp, nat0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cres(c0, co(c0, csupp, nat0))), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cmpt(s0, co(c0, csupp, nat0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)))), w3a(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2)))
  eqtr2d(co(crefld, cgsu, c0), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cres(c0, co(c0, csupp, nat0))), co(ccnfld, cgsu, c0), w3a(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2)))
  gsumres(ccnfld, c0, co(c0, csupp, nat0), cc, nat0, c1, c2, w3a(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2)))
  cnfld0()
  mp1i(w3a(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(ccnfld, ccmn), wcel(ccnfld, crg))
  cnring()
  ringcmn(ccnfld)
  sylancl(w3a(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2)), wf(c0, c1, cc), wf(c0, c1, cr), wss(cr, cc))
  fss(c0, c1, cr, cc)
  ssidd(co(c0, csupp, nat0), w3a(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2)))
  simp2(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2))
  gsumress(s0, ccnfld, c0, crefld, cc, caddc, cr, universe, c1, c2, nat0, w3a(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2)))
  cnfldbas()
  cnfldadd()
  df-refld()
  a1i(w3a(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(ccnfld, universe))
  cnfldex()
  simp3(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2))
  a1i(w3a(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2)), wss(cr, cc))
  ax-resscn()
  0red(w3a(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2)))
  jca(wa(w3a(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cc)), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), caddc, nat0), cv(s0)))
  addid2d(cv(s0), wa(w3a(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cc)))
  addid1d(cv(s0), wa(w3a(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cc)))
  simpr(w3a(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cc))
  oveq2d(ccnfld, cgsu, cres(c0, co(c0, csupp, nat0)), cmpt(s0, co(c0, csupp, nat0), cfv(c0, cv(s0))), w3a(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2)))
  feqresmpt(s0, c0, co(c0, csupp, nat0), c1, cr, w3a(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2)))
  gsumfsum(s0, co(c0, csupp, nat0), cfv(c0, cv(s0)), w3a(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2)))
  3ad2ant2(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(co(c0, csupp, nat0), cfn))
  fsuppimpd(c0, nat0, wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0))
  id(wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0))
  recnd(cfv(c0, cv(s0)), wa(w3a(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, csupp, nat0))))
  ffvelrnd(c0, cv(s0), cr, c1, wa(w3a(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, csupp, nat0))))
  simpl1(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cv(s0), co(c0, csupp, nat0)))
  sselda(cv(s0), co(c0, csupp, nat0), c1, w3a(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2)))
  fssdm(co(c0, csupp, nat0), c1, c0, cr, w3a(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2)))
  suppssdm(c0, nat0)
  simp1(wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2))
  diff.ccnfld.s(s0)
  diff.crefld.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.w3a.s(s0, wf(c0, c1, cr), wbr(c0, cfsupp, nat0), wcel(c1, c2))
  diff.wf.s(s0, c0, c1, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, cfsupp, nat0)
  diff.cfsupp.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, csupp, nat0)
  diff.csupp.s(s0)
  diff.nat0.s(s0)
}

thm regsumsupp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß c0[finSupp]0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚Üí(RRfld[gsum]c0)= sum(s0 ‚àà(c0[supp]0),(c0 ` s0)))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  3eqtrd((RRfld[gsum]c0), sum(s0 ‚àà(c0[supp]0),(c0 ` s0)), (CCfld[gsum](c0 |`(c0[supp]0))), (CCfld[gsum](s0 ‚àà(c0[supp]0)‚Ü¶(c0 ` s0))), ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß c0[finSupp]0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  eqtr2d((RRfld[gsum]c0), (CCfld[gsum](c0 |`(c0[supp]0))), (CCfld[gsum]c0), ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß c0[finSupp]0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  gsumres(ccnfld, c0, (c0[supp]0), cc, nat0, c1, c2, ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß c0[finSupp]0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  cnfld0()
  mp1i(((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß c0[finSupp]0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), CCfld ‚àà CMnd, CCfld ‚àà Ring)
  cnring()
  ringcmn(ccnfld)
  sylancl(((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß c0[finSupp]0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), (c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚ÑÇ), (c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù), ‚Ñù ‚äÜ ‚ÑÇ)
  fss(c0, c1, cr, cc)
  ssidd((c0[supp]0), ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß c0[finSupp]0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  simp2((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù), c0[finSupp]0, c1 ‚àà c2)
  gsumress(s0, ccnfld, c0, crefld, cc, caddc, cr, universe, c1, c2, nat0, ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß c0[finSupp]0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  cnfldbas()
  cnfldadd()
  df-refld()
  a1i(((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß c0[finSupp]0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), CCfld ‚àà ùïå)
  cnfldex()
  simp3((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù), c0[finSupp]0, c1 ‚àà c2)
  a1i(((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß c0[finSupp]0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), ‚Ñù ‚äÜ ‚ÑÇ)
  ax-resscn()
  0red(((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß c0[finSupp]0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  jca((((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß c0[finSupp]0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß s0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ), (0[+]s0)= s0, (s0[+]0)= s0)
  addid2d(s0, (((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß c0[finSupp]0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß s0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ))
  addid1d(s0, (((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß c0[finSupp]0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß s0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ))
  simpr(((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß c0[finSupp]0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2), s0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  oveq2d(ccnfld, cgsu, (c0 |`(c0[supp]0)), (s0 ‚àà(c0[supp]0)‚Ü¶(c0 ` s0)), ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß c0[finSupp]0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  feqresmpt(s0, c0, (c0[supp]0), c1, cr, ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß c0[finSupp]0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  gsumfsum(s0, (c0[supp]0), (c0 ` s0), ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß c0[finSupp]0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  3ad2ant2((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù), c0[finSupp]0, c1 ‚àà c2, (c0[supp]0)‚àà Fin)
  fsuppimpd(c0, nat0, c0[finSupp]0)
  id(c0[finSupp]0)
  recnd((c0 ` s0), (((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß c0[finSupp]0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß s0 ‚àà(c0[supp]0)))
  ffvelrnd(c0, s0, cr, c1, (((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß c0[finSupp]0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2)‚àß s0 ‚àà(c0[supp]0)))
  simpl1((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù), c0[finSupp]0, c1 ‚àà c2, s0 ‚àà(c0[supp]0))
  sselda(s0, (c0[supp]0), c1, ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß c0[finSupp]0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  fssdm((c0[supp]0), c1, c0, cr, ((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù)‚àß c0[finSupp]0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà c2))
  suppssdm(c0, nat0)
  simp1((c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù), c0[finSupp]0, c1 ‚àà c2)
  diff.ccnfld.s(s0)
  diff.crefld.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.w3a.s(s0, (c0 : c1 ‚Üí ‚Ñù), c0[finSupp]0, c1 ‚àà c2)
  diff.wf.s(s0, c0, c1, cr)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s0, c0, cfsupp, nat0)
  diff.cfsupp.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, csupp, nat0)

blocks.name: rzgrp
blocks.content: The quotient group R/Z is a group. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 26-Jan-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm rzgrp(class c0) {
  |- wcel(c0, cgrp)
  -| wceq(c0, co(crefld, cqus, co(crefld, cqg, cz)))
} = {
  ax-mp(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(cz, cfv(cnsg, crefld)))
  mpbir2an(wcel(cz, cfv(cnsg, crefld)), wcel(cz, cfv(csubg, crefld)), wral(hs0, cr, wral(hs1, cr, wb(wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), cz), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs0)), cz)))))
  ax-mp(wcel(cz, cfv(csubg, crefld)), wcel(cz, cfv(csubrg, crefld)))
  mpbir2an(wcel(cz, cfv(csubrg, crefld)), wcel(cz, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wss(cz, cr))
  zsubrg()
  zssre()
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(cz, cfv(csubrg, crefld)), wa(wcel(cz, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wss(cz, cr))), wcel(cr, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)))
  simpli(wcel(cr, cfv(csubrg, ccnfld)), wcel(crefld, cdr))
  resubdrg()
  subsubrg(cr, ccnfld, cz, crefld)
  df-refld()
  subrgsubg(cz, crefld)
  rgen2a(hs0, hs1, cr, wb(wcel(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), cz), wcel(co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs0)), cz)))
  eleq1d(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), cz, co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)))
  addcomd(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)))
  recnd(cv(hs0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)))
  simpl(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr))
  recnd(cv(hs1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr)))
  simpr(wcel(cv(hs0), cr), wcel(cv(hs1), cr))
  isnsg(hs0, hs1, cz, crefld, cr, caddc)
  rebase()
  replusg()
  qusgrp(cz, crefld, c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c(crefld)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(caddc)
  diff.hs1.c(cz)
  diff.hs1.c(crefld)
  diff.hs1.c(caddc)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rzgrp(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ c0 ‚àà Grp
  ‚ä£ c0 =(RRfld[/s](RRfld[~QG]‚Ñ§))
} = {
  ax-mp(c0 ‚àà Grp, ‚Ñ§ ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` RRfld))
  mpbir2an(‚Ñ§ ‚àà(NrmSGrp ` RRfld), ‚Ñ§ ‚àà(SubGrp ` RRfld), ‚àÄ(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, ‚àÄ(hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù,((hs0[+]hs1)‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Üî(hs1[+]hs0)‚àà ‚Ñ§))))
  ax-mp(‚Ñ§ ‚àà(SubGrp ` RRfld), ‚Ñ§ ‚àà(SubRing ` RRfld))
  mpbir2an(‚Ñ§ ‚àà(SubRing ` RRfld), ‚Ñ§ ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld), ‚Ñ§ ‚äÜ ‚Ñù)
  zsubrg()
  zssre()
  ax-mp((‚Ñ§ ‚àà(SubRing ` RRfld)‚Üî(‚Ñ§ ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld)‚àß ‚Ñ§ ‚äÜ ‚Ñù)), ‚Ñù ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld))
  simpli(‚Ñù ‚àà(SubRing ` CCfld), RRfld ‚àà DivRing)
  resubdrg()
  subsubrg(cr, ccnfld, cz, crefld)
  df-refld()
  subrgsubg(cz, crefld)
  rgen2a(hs0, hs1, cr, ((hs0[+]hs1)‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚Üî(hs1[+]hs0)‚àà ‚Ñ§))
  eleq1d((hs0[+]hs1), cz, (hs1[+]hs0), (hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù))
  addcomd(hs0, hs1, (hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù))
  recnd(hs0, (hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù))
  simpl(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  recnd(hs1, (hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù))
  simpr(hs0 ‚àà ‚Ñù, hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)
  isnsg(hs0, hs1, cz, crefld, cr, caddc)
  rebase()
  replusg()
  qusgrp(cz, crefld, c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cz)
  diff.hs0.c(crefld)
  diff.hs0.c(cr)
  diff.hs0.c(caddc)
  diff.hs1.c(cz)
  diff.hs1.c(crefld)
  diff.hs1.c(caddc)
}
